text: Issue when create new list via API

We are using below API endpoint to create a new list in our HubSpot account.
- <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/create_list>

Previously this API endpoint was creating a new list in our HubSpot account successfully but now it's returning a response like the below when creating a new list.
- list_permission_issue

Could you please help us to resolve this issue?

Hello, I have been trying to change the dropdown fields on the CRM programmatically (javascript, jquery) but it was not able to. I was able to change the input but not the dropdowns.  Can someone help me ?

Does anyone know if you have a wildcard DNS entry, such as *.<http://mydomain.com|mydomain.com> => <http://mydomain.com|mydomain.com>, and I have the <http://mydomain.com|mydomain.com> A record pointing to HubSpot, does HubSpot redirect every non-existent dns record to <http://mydomain.com|mydomain.com>?
Hey! Anyone here know of any official docs that compare HubSpot to Sitefinity? Or anyone have experience moving people from Sitefinity to HubSpot? With ammo to help sell HS over Sitefinity?

Is there a way to do get custom product data without a module using a module field?  {% set product = crm_object("product", 1428707712) %}  {{ product|tojson }} This doesn't display all of the data for the product object. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/crm-objects> - I am trying to display custom field product data in a line item of a custom quote using the line_items_table.module .

Hey, I built a custom app for our internal use testing, I tried to install it using url, when I install it on our live, it goes to redirect url with oauth token but it never shows up in our installed apps.
Do you know what could be wrong?
